ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales: Return to Wonderland
ComicInfo.Summary: Years have passed since Alice's first fell down the rabbit hole. Now an adult with a family, Alice's mind has drifted away from the safe shores of sanity into a silent world of madness. A madness that will not be denied and a madness her daughter Calie will soon discover for herself.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-29 11:25:56. [CVDB118962] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 12:38:27. [Issue ID 558708]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Al Rio,Daniel Leister,Eric Basaldua,Richard Bonk,Stjepan Šejić,Thomas Mason
ComicInfo.Characters: Carroll Ann "Calie" Liddle,Johnny Liddle,Alice Liddle,Lewis Liddle,Rabbit,Doctor Ying
